This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

Mayor's Office
==============

[![Mayor Cassie at the State of the City 2024 doing a selfie with the crowd behind her](https://www.everettwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=13088)](https://www.everettwa.gov/SOTC)

Learn more about Mayor Franklin
-------------------------------

Mayor Cassie Franklin took office on Jan. 1, 2018. [Learn more about her](https://www.everettwa.gov/1132/About-the-Mayor) and her vision for Everett.

Mayor Franklin’s priorities
---------------------------

Mayor Franklin's priorities are violence prevention, behavioral health and creating a prosperous city. To learn more about these critical priorities and how they guide the City’s work, check out her annual [State of Everett](https://www.everettwa.gov/2984/2023-State-of-the-City) address and her Mayoral Directives.

Contact the Mayor
-----------------

Please [complete this form](https://www.everettwa.gov/FormCenter/Mayors-Office-4/Contact-the-Mayor-94) to share concerns, provide feedback or ask a question.

Invite the Mayor to an Event
----------------------------

Please [complete this form](https://www.everettwa.gov/FormCenter/Mayors-Office-4/Invite-the-Mayor-to-an-Event-235) to invite the Mayor to an event.

### [Contact Us](https://www.everettwa.gov/Directory.aspx)

   Mayor

   [Email Cassie Franklin](mailto:cfranklin@everettwa.gov)

   [Invite the Mayor to an Event](https://www.everettwa.gov/FormCenter/Mayors-Office-4/Invite-the-Mayor-to-an-Event-235)
2. #### Mayor's Office

   **Physical Address**
     
   2930 Wetmore Avenue  
   Suite 10-A  
   Everett, WA 98201

     

   Phone: [425-257-7115](tel:4252577115)

   Fax: 425-257-8729
